section.p: Contains information about the cancelation of the pharmacy order.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] comment with data type String
Any comments added to document why the order was cancelled. Note changes made June 2 2009 per CDS\Hdr order set issue. VHIM disagrees with approach needs be re-reviewed in the future. Changes are set attribute comments multipilicity to '*'.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateTime with data type Point In Time
The date/time the order was cancelled.

Contains exactly one [1..1] reason with data type Code
The reason the order was cancelled.
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Individual Provider

Contains exactly one [1..1] comment with data type String
Any comments added to document why the order was cancelled. Note changes made June 2 2009 per CDS\Hdr order set issue. VHIM disagrees with approach needs be re-reviewed in the future. Changes are set attribute comments multipilicity to '*'.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateTime with data type Point In Time
The date/time the order was cancelled.

Contains exactly one [1..1] reason with data type Code
The reason the order was cancelled.
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Individual Provider
